title.romaji: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. OVA
title.english: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU OVA

media.description:
The Service Club is recruited by a magazine to write an article promoting "Love and Marriage". Yukino calls in Hachiman's younger sister Komachi for assistance, and the three of them, along with Yui and their teacher Shuzuka get side-tracked and begin competing to see who can be the best wife.

(Source: ANN)

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the Yahari Game demo Ore no Seishun Lovecome wa Machigatteiru. PlayStation Vita game from 5pb.

(Source: AniDB)

The "loosely science-fiction adventure" is set in the summer sometime in the 21st century. Tokyo's Shinjuku ward has become a wasteland, void of all humans due to an unexplained catastrophe. What remains are these strange creatures such as "Donyatsu," the half-cat, half-doughnut hybrid, and "Begaru," a feline bagel composite.

(Source: ANN)
The movie focuses on a game between Sumiya 2 and Aoba Gakuin.

The story is set in December of 2199, when the streets are full of anticipation for the end of the year and the start of the new one. Amid the celebrations, word spreads that Ragna the Bloodedge, an SS-class rebel with the highest ever bounty on his head, has appeared in the 13th Hierarchical City of Kagutsuchi. The apparent aim of Ragna or the "Grim Reaper" is the destruction of the system controlling the world. To collect the bounty, a motley array of unrivaled fighters converge on Kagutsuchi.

(Source: ANN)

The Sengoku era gave birth to many historical legends. One of them is Naoe Naoe Kanetsugu, the brilliant military general of the Uesugi family. Together with Maeda Keiji, a legendary warrior on the battlefield, who become lifelong friends with each other, they carve out a piece of history in the most dangerous and volatile time in Japan’s history. The two men recall their beginnings and the journey they took to get to the accomplished position they now sit at.

media.description:
One day, a fashion model fell in love with a human-sized anthropomorphic stag beetle. The two were both married, and they have a strange daughter!

Tsumami, the odd couple's only child, is an absolute troublemaker. She is capable of turning others' lives to mistress and likes to cause calamities to the public.

Following the release of their 8th album "DUM SPIRO SPERO," Japanese rock band Dir en Grey went into hiatus following a vigorous touring schedule in Japan and abroad, a year and a half later returning with their single "RINKAKU" released on December 19th, 2012.  Once again animator Keita Kurosaka was enlisted to create a hand drawn music video, that in many regards is much less shocking and grotesque than the band's previous collaboration with Kurosaka, the infamous "Agitated Screams of Maggots" music video.

Spinoff of the original PES series. Is also an ad to Toyota's new Vios vehicle.

Illyasviel von Einzbern, an ordinary elementary schoolgirl who dreams about anime magical girls—until she encounters Magical Ruby and assumes the duties of a real magical girl.

(Source: ANN)

title.romaji: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio: Ars Nova

media.description:
In the story, a Fleet of Fog loaded with super weapons suddenly appear all over the world. Without the ability to withstand this fleet, humanity was defeated and could no longer travel the seas. 17 years after the devastating naval war, Chihaya Gunzou and his friends somehow commandeer a Fleet of Fog submarine and rename it I-401. Together with Iona, they take on the Fleet of Fog.

(Source: ANN)

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 3 - The Fortress Port of Yokosuka
Episode 12 - The Power to Open a Path

media.description:
As a child, Raku Ichijo made a secret promise with his childhood sweetheart, keeping a pendant as a memento while his love took the key. He dreams of one day meeting his past love, but years later, reality smashes his hopes when Chitoge Kirisaki accidentally knees him in the face...

Though Raku's a normal high schooler, his family heads the notorious yakuza gang the Shuei-Gumi faction! And he's dragged into family affairs when he's forced into a relationship with Chitoge, the daughter of a rival gang's boss!

Despite their constant spats, the two somehow fool everyone with their false relationship. Raku then discovers that Chitoge has a mysterious key from her past, which she can't remember... Plus, two other girls appear with keys as well—Kosaki Onodera and Marika Tachibana!

Caught in the midst of this love maelstrom, even more complications arise for Raku when his class decides on Romeo and Juliet as the class's play for the school festival. Can the two false lovebirds pull off the impossible and make the play a success?

(Source: Viz Media)
Based on a same name children's fantasy picture book by Takeshita Ryuunosuke.

A girl who is willing to protect a boy she likes from the bully's naughty kids. The girl sells herself to be replaced by not disturbing the guy she likes anymore. The naughty guy takes advantage of this situation to be able to continue to enjoy the body of the girl...

(Source: Nekopoi and Has Been Translated)
Three reporters from the school paper get transported back to the Edo period.

title.english: Ghost in the Shell: Arise - Another Mission

media.description:
The premise of the story: "Snatch the rebel elements' secret data using the Surface! There is a leak saying that the giant coporation Ishimiya Industry will commit an act of international terrorism, and Motoko Kusanagi and the Armored Riot Police head out to seize the plug data!"

(Source: ANN)

A short animation for promoting Microsoft's Surface tablet in Japan.

title.romaji: Takanashi Rikka Kai: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Movie
title.english: Love, Chunibyo and Other Delusions!: Rikka Version

media.description: Summary of the first season of the show, as seen from Rikka's perspective with new elements.

Green Leaves Entertainment is a tiny production company on the verge of going out of business in Sendai, the biggest city in Japan's northeastern Tohoku region. The agency once managed the careers of magicians, photo idols, fortune-tellers, and other entertainers, but its last remaining client finally quit. In danger of having zero talent (literally), the president Tange hatches an idea of producing an idol group. On the brash president's orders, the dissatisfied manager Matsuda heads out to scout raw talent. Matsuda makes a fateful encounter with a certain girl….

Source: ANN
Specials bundled with the BD/DVD volumes.

title.romaji: Tobe! Pegasus Kokoro no Goal ni Shoot

media.description:
The movie is about the soccer team Pegasus created from the visually impaired children studying in the Chiba Prefectural School for the Blind.

(Source: allcinema)

Based on the adult game by Moonstone Cherry.

It's summer vacation and Keiichi's parents left him with his five younger sisters to go on an overseas trip. Now with their parents far out of the picture, his younger sisters are aggressively making their moves on him. Of course there's no way he can hold back.

Source: Hau~ Omochikaeri!
Animated musical by Makoto Wada.

Educational video that teaches kids about the value of money and the consequences of overconsumption.

*Part of the series of films produced with cooperation of: Japan's Central Council for Financial Services Information and Bank of Japan Public Relations Department.
Based on the same name manga by Kobayashi Makoto.

An adaptation of the Future Card Buddyfight card game.

Future Card Buddyfight takes place in a more futuristic version of today. The card game connects to a parallel universe through special cards (Buddy Rare Cards) that act as portals. They bring monsters to Earth in order for them to become buddies with humans. Through friendship and courage, they take on and fight challenges, known as Buddyfights, where people of all ages have friendly non-hurtful competitions. The main character, Gaou Mikado has just started Buddyfighting. As the story progresses, Buddyfights are seeming to become a little too real...

(Source: MAL)
